column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi K S. - Thank you for your review. As a high-volume
column3: we must remain vigilant when seating our guests. Although the restaurant may have been mostly empty when you arrived
column4: we have filled to capacity in less than 5 minutes. As such
column5: we have simultaneously dealt with situations where we sat one guest who claimed to be waiting on a companion
column6: only to discover the companion would not arrive for another hour.
